hero.title: End‑to‑End AI & Product Consulting
hero.subtitle: Diagnosis, strategy and AI adoption with measurable results.

pitch.subtitle_long: We align business, data and technology to prioritize use cases, estimate impact and build a realistic roadmap. We enable decisions with prototypes, benchmarks and controlled tests.
sales_focus: Use cases with estimated ROI and mapped risks.
Pilot in weeks and scale with governance.

definition.what_is: Senior advisory to assess maturity, select AI/automation opportunities and define architecture, processes and success metrics.

pains: Lack of metrics and ownership in AI.
Vendors and tools not aligned with strategy.
deliverables: Prioritized use cases with ROI and risks.

faqs.a: Between 3 and 6 weeks depending on scope and stakeholder availability.
We can continue with pilots and implementation if you decide so.

faqs.q: Do you work with our existing stack?
faqs.a: Yes, we integrate with your cloud, data and current tools.
